findings.title: Claim with amount zero
findings.description: In the vesting method if meth amount fetched is zero, the method still goes ahead to execute the claim and update other state values with the value zero.

findings.title: MintingMin set to zero
findings.description: The value of mintingMin can even be set to zero as there are no validations for the value in the setter.

findings.title: Hardcoded initialization and parameters in method calls
findings.description: Several state variables have been initialized with hardcoded values in the constructor and there are several internal method calls that use hardcoded parameters.

findings.title: Missing setter validation for mintingMin
findings.description: The value of mintingMin can even be set to zero as there are no validations for the value in the setter.
